//This is the author page for the scp wiki user known as [[*user Diogene_s]], for other uses, see [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diogenes_(disambiguation) the actual Diogenes (disambiguation)]//

[[div class="wikibox"]]
[[span class="capt cyan"]]Diogene_s[[/span]]
[[image Diogenes.jpg]]
They drew him with the titty out.
[[/div]]

+ Definition of Diogene_s

Diogene_s  (/daɪˈɒdʒɪniːz/ dy-OJ-in-eez; in whatever language you choose to use), also known as Dio or "[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Penguin_(album) penguin]", is an [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artist artist] and [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Writer writer] for the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SCP_Foundation SCP Wiki]. Other names with which people have referred to them have been "Dio", "Diogenes", "Multiverse map guy",[[footnote]]The map in question, for those interested, is [https://www.reddit.com/r/SCP/comments/xnjuqq/a_better_drawn_possible_map_of_the_scp_multiverse/ this absolute monstrosity].[[/footnote]] "penguin" and "throwing you in the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microwave_(Vietnamese_band) microwave]".  They were born in [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spain_(horse) Spain] in 412 or 404 BC and died yesterday in mysterious and unexplained circumstances.

Their presence in the community has been a relatively short one, with their first [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zbHw47INzEY&list=PLBaC7nMz00WjIhsBb1ZMWMCi24URMSQRF post] being on the 20th of [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caesar_salad July] of 2023. Contrary to [https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3c/Logo_del_PP_%282022%29.svg popular] belief, some of their writing still survives in the [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/ Wiki] in some way, shape or form[[footnote]]Citation needed.[[/footnote]]. And according to some sources, they can be seen hanging around in 19cord, Metafoundation and the Canonexus discord servers. But never the forums, because, and according to their own words, "they don't want to repeat that one incident with the Agora and all that good shit". They are, allegedly, a junior member of the tagging team.

On numerous occasions, they have expressed an interest in history, art, art history, philosophy[[footnote]] duh. [[/footnote]], penguins, trains, listening to as much music as possible, speculative fiction, not having a defined gender, eating the rich, causing a second [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Late_Bronze_Age_collapse Bronze Age Collapse] and literature. They're also one of the three confessed primary catalan speakers in the wiki (according to [[[2023-survey-results |the 2023 site survey]]]) and they will make it your problem.

+ Reception and Critique towards Diogene_s

The overall [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chemical_reaction reaction] to Diogene_s is that they should work more in their dialogue, and pacing, and descriptions, and stop doing so many typos and being better at playing video games. It is also a general consensus that they should stop telling people to "go to sleep" because "sleep is good" and should also stop reacting with the words "good [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Feces shit]" to any meaningless development in a conversation.

++ Quotes

Here is what people have had to say about this person.[[footnote]]Once the floodgates were opened, everyone decide that they couldn't shut up about this guy. I'm sorry for any problems this may be causing (but I'm not really sorry).[[/footnote]] If you want a quote, just ping me in 19cord or metaf or canonexus or wherever and me and my council of quote-reviewers will review it. Or you can just leave it yourself here. I'm not the quote police:

"Dio is everyone's favorite Spanish Penguin, or as we say in the business, 'Pingüino'" - [[*user Uncle Nicolini]] while looking at the penguins in the nearest zoo.
"Picking my nose at the club slipping boogers into unattended cups" - [[*user Troutmaskreplica]]. That's disgusting. We at Wikipedia do not endorse this kind of behaviour.
"ha ha I got first quote" - [[*user Parallelpotatoes]] who ran a marathon to get here and get the first quote. They didn't get it, but we appreciate their effort.
«I've got a quote for you: "Don't quote me on this."» - [[*user Cathy Autumn]] who then proceeded to turn green, magenta, grey and exploded in a puff of spiders.
"wiki user [[*user diogene_s]] (not to be confused with wiki user [[*user diogenes]]) is cool" - [[*user merehrab]] why do people keep bringing up the other guy who I definitely did not murder with a pool noodle?
"Disambiguates you" - [[*user IndustryStandard]] AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAUGH[[footnote]] that hurts [[/footnote]][[footnote]] later, [[*user Parallelpotatoes]] would try to reambiguate dio. Worked partially and now we have this weird-ass wikipedia page.[[/footnote]]
"I plead the fifth" - [[*user J_V_G]] who isn't even American, and as far as I (an anonymous editor) know, those damn british twats do not have our goddamn rights and guns and constitution and this guy wants to take it from us and take our identity? I say no. NO. **GOD BLESS AMERICAAARGH**.
"Hedvig" - [[*user Miss Lapis]] who we think is collecting "Hedvig" quotes in as many author pages as possible.
"I am... The Spot." - [[*user shuso]] who's the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spot_(comics) Spot]. Or maybe a [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_Pole_Traverse path through Antarctica].
"I'll think of something" - [[*user Aftokrator]] while committing six simultaneous grave breaches of the Geneva Convention.
"We’ll miss you champ. Can’t believe the 23 penguins got to you." - [[*user DoctorLilithsophia]] who wants to pin the murder in some poor helpless animals. If you ask me, I think she's hiding something.
"what?" - [[*user Psychicprogrammer]] who also clarified that no LLMs were used to write this statement.
"another one for the nightmare blunt rotation, boys" - [[*user dino--draws]] do not consume drugs kids. You'll get targeted by an evil entity from beyond human comprehension and loose your identity.
"Hi, this is my guest appearance" - [[*user Ethagon]], appearing with great fanfarre and breaking the 4th wall.
"Hedvig <3" - [[*user Miss Lapis]] who loves Hedvig![[footnote]] there's no rule against quoting someone twice [[/footnote]]
*flexes rhetorically* - [[*user Torcsandantlers]] who is trying to win an argument by roleplaying as [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Plato Plato][[footnote]] [[*user Diogene_s]] promptly delivered a thousand featherless chickens to  [[*user Torcsandantlers]]' current location [[/footnote]]
“You thought this would be a normal author page quote, but it was me, Dio!” - [[*user MisterFrown]] who doesn't know that I haven't watched Jojo's bizarre adventure.
"-1, no philosophical messaging. I expected more from Diogenes." - [[*user YardBirdMe]] who surprised everyone by not referencing the number five.
"Who are you why are you in my house, what's an es-see-pee wickee" - [[*user Pab07]] from that one time diogene_s was nearly murdered by a cleaver wielding freak.
"This guy... is like an owl" - [[*user VapidPoem]] pointing at an owl that just stole its sandwich and its wallet.
"Aren't you that guy that threw a featherless chicken at my pal plato?" - [[*user Yossipossi]] no, that would be intertemporal identity theft and it's frowned in most times and places that respect themselves.
"Here's a quote for ya, Giodens_e" - [[*user AwhRyan]] who will suffer a terrible fate for this.
"uh. my brain is currently fried from doing statics assignements and listening to nirvana for 6 hours straight" - [[*user ralliston]] who then offered is brain to the hungry masses.
"a penguin penguin burst through my wall coolaid man style speaking spanish i think, they pointed a mic at me and forced me to give an interview" - [[*user Littlepengwy]] and we implore him to be abit more original next time with this statement, please. Everyone already knows about our interviewing methods, there's no need to repeat them in the interview itself.
“He’s just a little guy and I’d trust him with my bank account information. Just look at that art!!! Little guy behavior[[footnote]] - i am not being held at pen-point - [[*user dino--draws]] HOW THE FUCK DID FI GET INTO THE FOOTNOTE SECTION! SOMEONE GET FIR OUT OF THERE!!![[/footnote]]” - [[*user dino--draws]] because everyone thinks diogene-s is very very short. Must be the fact that they associate themselves with small birds and shit. What a loser. They're not even an ornitologist.
"Probably cool. Wish I'd been alive at the same time as them." - [[*user Lemonsense]] who definitely didn't murder this author with a contraption that included a pulley system, a polearm, a car speeding down a highway, three dying squirrels, and shooting their head with a sawed-off shotgun.
"Wish i had something for the quotes page" - [[*user Guaire]] who then proceeded to run through the streets while riding a giant rodent fed exclusively with plates of //pulpo á feira//.
"locked me into a microwave for 30 hours once and broiled me until i promised to read 8kdr. ngl I kind of get it now." - [[*user Intercedent]] and this isn't even my favourite type of radiation! (also, [[*user ralliston]], please pay me for my advertisement)
"You are the reason I'm melting the ice caps." - [[*user Winkwonkboi]], while going around with a flamethrower in the South Pole.
"All hail Grand Monarch diogene_s, Second of Their Name, Tagger Supreme, Master Critter of the MetaF Kingdom, High Artist and Writer of the Fourth Circle, Obscurer of Genders and All Around Awesome Human Being. Long may they reign!" - [[*user UNCGriffin]] who didn't get the memo about how we're all pretty anti-monarchy in this joint.
"That's too many quotes" - [[*user Diogene_s]], who's tired after copy-pasting all of these.
"I mean they're alive, so that's a plus." - [[*user SpaceStealth]] who came in late with factually wrong information fact-checked by real and true patriots.

+ Recommendations
Throughout its long life, [[[diogene-s-disambiguation |Diogene_s]]] read, watched and listened to many things. Here is a list of things they recommended in their last messages before they were cruched by a [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rock_(processor) rock] at the ripe age of six weeks old.

[[collapsible show="Recs of wiki stuff" hide="- close"]]

**Hubs:**

It is known that the best canons are as follows and in this order (now arranged in the next best thing after literall tierlists. So, a table.):

||~ Name of level ||~ Name of canon ||
|| Literally peak || From 120's Archives, On Guard 43, S&C Plastics, Lampeter, Site 17 Deepwell catalogue, No Return. ||
|| Kino || Orcadia, AIAD, Our Open Veins, Fading Stars, SIMULACRUM, Resurrection, Man who wasn't there, Resurrection, Third Law, Those Twisted Pines, War on all fronts, Nightfall, Sharkest Timeline, Doctors of the church,[[footnote]]because [[*user kothardarastrix]] is a friend and the canon curator so what do you want me to say?[[/footnote]] Trashfire and Cool War 2 ||
|| They're there || Broken Masquerade, Coldest War, End of Death, Insect Hell, But a Dream ||
|| Not a big fan || Straight on till morning, Dread and circuses, In Memoria Adytum, Unfounded, Unhuman, Competitive Escathology, lolfoundation, green king, daybreak, bellerverse, old man and the sea and Aces & 8s. ||
|| I'm an ignorant bitch who hasn't read these || Forgotten Memories, Ninth World, Pitch Haven, Wonderful World, bottledick, mount golgotha, only game in town. ||

Holy shit that's a lot of canons. I pity Ralliston. This is of course, fully biased and not accurate to whatever you think, reader. I am human and fallible and I have my beliefs.

Now, my favorite series not included in content of the previous ranking are:

Hecatoncheires Cycle, Redtape, Emerald Dawn and Dark Side Discography.

(more to be added soon)

My favorite GOIs[[footnote]]In terms of how interesting they are to me, this isn't born of some need to self identify with them.[[/footnote]] are: Serpents Hand, Goldbaker Reinz.
